description:
The IRS and Wage and Hour Division have made it a priority to audit businesses to make sure that the individuals they are paying as independent contractors qualify. Businesses have been required to pay MILLIONS of dollars in wages, taxes and penalties for being out of compliance.

This Essential Payroll Series e-training provides guidance on how to determine if a worker qualifies to be treated as an independent contractor. In 35 minutes you will know where the rules can be found, how they are applied during an audit, know the 4 targeted industries, and the 6 steps you can take to protect your company from contractor classification mistakes.

You can download a PDF of the presentation to take notes. In addition our contact information is available at the end of the presentation if you have additional questions you would like to submit.
title: How to Identify Independent Contractors
